statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ProductID , AA.Description , AA.DescriptionRTF
FROM dbo.TProductDescription AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ProductID = #ProductID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TProductDescription AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TProductDescription ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ProductID, Description, DescriptionRTF ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ProductID#, #Description#, #DescriptionRTF# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TProductDescription SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ProductID = #ProductID# , Description = #Description# , DescriptionRTF = #DescriptionRTF# WHERE ID = #ID#
